title: Council Decision of 13 December 2004 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
22.4.2005 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 98/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 13 December 2004
appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
(2005/C 98/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third subparagraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency (1),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 14 June 1999 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (2),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas:
The members of the Committee for the period up to 28 March 2005 should be appointed, having regard to the nominations submitted by the Governments of the Members States which are currently not represented,
main_body:
The following persons are hereby appointed members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency:
Cyprus (1 place) Mr Panicos DEMETRIADES
Czech Republic (3 places) Mr Miroslav ŠEDINA
Mr Zdeněk HUBÁČEK
Mr Vladimír HLAVINKA
Estonia (1 place) Ms Merle LUST
Hungary (3 places) Mr Zoltán HORVÁTH
Mr Ákos PETŐ
Ms Ágnes SZÉL
Latvia (1 place) Mr Andrejs SALMIŅŠ
Lithuania (1 place) Mr Donaldas JASULAITIS
Poland (5 places) Mr Stefan CHWASZCZEWSKI
Ms Katarzyna HINCZ
Mr Jacek Tadeusz KANIEWSKI
Mr Grzegorz KRZYSZTOSZEK
Mr Wladyslaw SIKORA
Slovenia (1 place) Mr Ivo NOVAK
Slovakia (2 places) Mr Michal DURANKO
Mr Eduard ĎURČEK
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 2004.
For the Council
The President
B.R. BOT
(1)  OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58. Statutes last amended by the Act concerning the conditions of accession, Annex II, Chapter 12 Energy, A. General, paragraph 1(c) (OJ L 236, 23.9.2003, p. 586).
(2)  OJ C 186, 2.7.1999, p. 1.
